oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ordinary License
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A person granted a license to keep an Ordinary was obligated to provide wholesome, cleanly lodging and diet for travelers, stabling and fodder for their horses, and "shall not permit unlawful gaming, nor on the Sabbath day suffer any person to tipple or drink any more than nescessary." 5 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Talbott, Thomas; Parker, Isham Allen
Nashville (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
